name: WR Designs
tag_list: web-design, web-development, graphic-design, print-design, social-media-marketing, search-engine-optimization, press-release-distribution, content-writing, 3d-design
overview:
WR Designs is a web design consultancy group.

WR Designs is a young and fast growing New York based web design and development company with over 7 years of experience providing, quality-assured website products and services.

WR Designs consists of well-equipped web designers, graphic designers, programmers, brand developers, copywriters, motion graphic experts, and search engine marketing experts.

Web design and development is the foundation of our online business development solutions. WR Designs offer a board range of web services, paying heed to every aspect of creating exceptional and fully functional sites that leave memorable experiences upon online visitors.

They offer:

-Website Design & Development -Website Redesign -E-commerce: Shopping Cart System -Content Management System -Open Source Software -Blog Development -Graphic Design -3D Design -Web 2.0 / Social Networking -Content Creation & Marketing Message -CSS/XHTML Coding -Database Development -PHP & ASP.NET Development -Branding & Logo Development -Search Engine Optimization -Website Marketing -Banner Advertising -HTML Email Marketing
